name: Flag of South Korea
description:
South Korea is a country in East Asia. Its flag is known as the Taegeukgi.

After r/Korea_Place fought together with r/UKOnPlace against an attack on the previous Korean flag and the Greggs logo by the streamer PerraBaby, this flag was given a place on the Union Jack, held by Paddington Bear. It served as the final home of r/Korea_Place.
